==*New Install*==
 # Upload *webloginpe* and all it's contents to */assets/snippets/* in your MODx installation.
 # Access your MODx Manager.
 # Go to "Resources" > "Manage Resources" > "Snippets" and create a new snippet.
 # Name this snippet WebLoginPE. Add this description...
{{{
<strong>1.3.2</strong> A progressively enhanced, complete Web User management snippet.
}}}
 # Open *webloginpe.snippet.php* and copy it's contents to the snippet code area back in the manager. Save the snippet.
